bwwExcerpt: Go with an open mind and you'll be blown away. True, the show by Laurence O'Keefe, Nell Benjamin and bookwriter Heather Hach - which first reached Broadway in 2007 - has a head start on the movie. It's far wittier, with insidious melodies and lyrics that are cheeky enough to rhyme "snobs" with "Thomas Hobbes".
